title: MCP RAG Tool Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for MCP tool that indexes codebases for RAG search

dbStoragePath.description: Base directory path for persistent database storage

model.description: Model configuration for embedding and LLM

embedding.description: Embedding model to use for vector embeddings

llm.description: Large language model to use for responses

indices.description: Collection of RAG search indices to configure

items.title: RAG Search Index
items.description: Configuration for a single RAG search index

toolName.description: Name of the MCP tool for this index

description.description: Description of what this index contains and its purpose

paths.description: Collection of directory or file paths to index

globPattern.description: Glob pattern for filtering files within the specified paths
